# expanded

**Type Property**

A window toolbar style which displays its title bar area above the toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
static var expanded: ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle { get }
```

## Getting built-in window toolbar styles

- **automatic**: The automatic window toolbar style.
- **unified**: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.
- **unified(showsTitle:)**: A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.
- **unifiedCompact**: A window toolbar style similar to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified], but with a more compact vertical sizing.
- **unifiedCompact(showsTitle:)**: A window toolbar style similar to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified], but with a more compact vertical sizing.
